about_the_game:
"Quadbots: The Rise of Chrono" invites you to a thrilling single-player, top-down adventure where you embark on a cosmic quest. Long ago, the Quadbots lived in peace, their planet powered by an infinite energy source, the NOVANGEL. Due to the greed of Chrono, one of the Quadbots' leaders, who coveted that power for himself, chaos ensued. Drunk with power, Chrono ruled the planet, turning many Quadbots to his side. The Elite Quadbots rose against Chrono, defeating him and forcing him to shatter the NOVANGEL into orbs. He teleported them to various locations, guarded by colossal robots to remain hidden. Additionally, Chrono scattered each Elite Quadbot to different locations, preventing their reunion and posing a threat. Now, it's up to you to collect the NOVANGEL pieces, recruit your fellow Elite Quadbots, and defeat Chrono once and for all!

Choose from a variety of Quadbots and weapons, each with unique abilities, to navigate diverse landscapes. Confront colossal robotic guardians, accept challenges, and engage in intense battles as you collect NOVANGEL orbs. Immerse yourself in this captivating single-player experience, where the fate of Quadbots rests on your shoulders. Unleash your chosen Quadbot and triumph over Chrono's rising threat!
